title: Jonah Heim vs. Dodgers Preview, Player Prop Bets - June 13
text:
The Texas Rangers, including Jonah Heim (.158 batting average in his past 10 games), take on starting pitcher Michael Grove and the Los Angeles Dodgers at Dodger Stadium, Thursday at 10:10 PM ET.
In his most recent game he had a hitless performance (0-for-4) against the Dodgers.

Jonah Heim At The Plate Heim is batting .237 with six doubles, six home runs and 12 walks. Heim has recorded a hit in 36 of 60 games this year (60.0%), including 13 multi-hit games (21.7%). In six games this year, he has homered (10.0%, and 2.6% of his trips to the dish). In 31.7% of his games this year, Heim has driven in at least one run. In nine of those games (15.0%) he recorded two or more RBI, while accounting for three or more of his team's runs in two contests. He has scored in 16 games this season (26.7%), including multiple runs in five games. Rep your team with officially licensed MLB gear! Head to Fanatics to find jerseys, shirts, and much more.
Jonah Heim Home/Away Batting Splits Home Away 31 GP 28 .236 AVG .239 .288 OBP .270 .355 SLG .339 7 XBH 5 3 HR 3 13 RBI 18 26/7 K/BB 18/5 0 SB 1 Dodgers Pitching Rankings The pitching staff for the Dodgers has a collective 8.7 K/9, the 10th-best in the league. The Dodgers have a 3.26 team ERA that ranks fourth across all MLB pitching staffs. The Dodgers rank 16th in baseball in home runs surrendered (72 total, one per game). Grove (4-2) makes the start for the Dodgers, his second of the season. In his last appearance -- in relief on Wednesday -- the righty tossed one inning against the Texas Rangers, giving up one earned run while surrendering two hits. author: jullias.otieno@radioafricagroup.co.ke (JULIUS OTIENO)
title: Support pastoralists in conservation efforts, say French envoy, Governor Guyo
text: - The Cherab Community Conservancy Offices have been established courtesy of the French Development Agency (AFD) through the Northern Rangelands Trust. - The leaders hailed the positive impact brought about in the region since the establishment of the community conservancy in the year 2021 Leaders have called for continued collaboration to support pastoralist communities to scale up environmental and wildlife conservation efforts. This is in a bid to mitigate the adverse impact of climate change. Speaking during the opening of the new Cherab Community Conservancy Offices at Korbesa in Isiolo, French Ambassador Arnaud Suquet and Isiolo Governor Abdi Guyo emphasised the need for partnerships. “Community Conservancies play a key role in environmental conservation, security and uplifting livelihoods through initiatives like Ujuzi Manyattani,” Guyo said on Wednesday. State and non-state actors should partner to boost the capacity of local pastoralist communities to embark on sustainable environmental conservation programmes. This, they said, will enhance conservation measures and boost the fight against climate change. The Cherab Offices was established courtesy of the French Development Agency through the Northern Rangelands Trust. The leaders hailed the positive impact brought about in the region since the establishment of the community conservancy in the year 2021. Notable achievements have been realised, including the elimination of the poaching menace, enhancing proper grazing patterns and planting trees to save the land from degradation. The governor called for continued support to conservation efforts through the community conservancy model. “I urge the people of Isiolo to support conservation efforts to combat climate change and assure them that the community land registration process is firmly on track,” the county chief added. "I want to say thank you to the French Development Agency (AFD) and the Northern Rangelands Trust for their support. We will continue to strengthen our partnership for the benefit of Isiolo." He assured the locals that the process of community land registration was firmly on track, to alleviate fears that they could lose their grazing lands to foreign entities in the guise of conservancies. "Land registration and issuance of title deeds remains my priority number one as I pledged during the last general election," Guyo said.

author: 星洲网
title: 荥阳堂郑氏宗祠永传藏书阁 上万书籍只允现场阅读 - 地方
text:
荥阳堂郑氏宗祠永传藏书阁 上万书籍只允现场阅读
（马六甲23日讯）马六甲荥阳堂郑氏宗祠永久荣誉族长拿督郑永传捐赠私人藏书给宗祠，使宗祠成为甲州一个可探索知识的宝山。
ADVERTISEMENT
设于一楼的永传藏书阁，包含上万本政经文教书籍，藏书目前暂不外借，只许现场阅读。
房有平率理事参观
马六甲中华大会堂主席房有平今日与理事到郑氏宗祠访间，在郑永传的带领下，参观这座浩瀚的知识海洋。
郑永传说，藏书阁有中、英文书籍，包括一些中英双语翻译版，也有少许马来文书籍。
郑永传对每本书位置非常清楚
藏书阁内有中国经典书籍、名著、百科全书、诺贝尔文学得奖作品、不只收藏了郑永传本身钻研佛教的经书，也有其他各宗教如兴都教、基都教、伊斯兰教书籍。
热爱阅读的郑永传说，他至今保持购书的习惯，翻阅过的书籍当中，有的还会画重点，拥有超强记忆力的他，对于每一本书的排放位置，皆非常清楚。
“藏书阁的书柜都是我设计的，柜上有雕刻莲花。”
需聘请图书管理员
他说，目前一星期数天他都会在藏书阁，而藏书阁需聘请一名图书管理员。
郑永传也是甲中华大会堂前主席。他今日与荥阳堂郑氏宗祠族长郑金福、副族长郑木荣、总务郑成川、妇女组署理主席郑敏莉校长接待中华大会堂的到访。随同大会堂主席房有平到访的有秘书陈寿锦及财政许庆华。
郑永传也与出席者分享他当年领导甲华堂的点滴，包括在任会长12年时，从购置甲华堂会所至落成的经过。
他表示，当年筹备购置会所时，获得了社团前辈、企业商贾、政党人士等的支持与协助。
他分享说，作为华社领导人，除了执行职务，也要懂得找钱。
他表示小时候家境贫穷，但刻苦耐劳，后来到新加坡半工读，并以奖学金完成大学。
“华社面对最大的问题就是一些没有受到良好教育的孩子，却当上了非法借贷者，或者当大耳窿的跑腿。”
因此，他认为，教育是非常重要的一环。
